text: Tajak banduateuh laju bagah Tapeugah kamoe Rasul Po gata Neuyue bak gata keu noe meulangkah Bani Israil tajok keu kamoe Bek le lagee nyou buetteuh that salah Bek taazeueb dum Bani Israil Kamoe ba dalil Neubri le Allah Kamcoe ba ayat nibak Po gata Salam seujahtra soe ikot Allah Soe nyang tem ikot peutunyok Tuhan
